column1: Explain the concept of A/B testing and its applications in data-driven decision making.
Describe the process of designing and conducting a successful A/B test.
Discuss how you would measure the impact of a data science project on business metrics.
Briefly explain key performance indicators (KPIs) relevant to specific business domains (tailored to the role at Deloitte).
How do you stay informed about industry trends and their potential impact on data science applications?
